RelatedSentence: PIERRE -- The prosecutor in the murder trial of a Pierre teen will update Hughes County commissioners this week .
KCCR - AM reports Beadle County State 's Attorney Michael Moore is representing Hughes County in the case of 17 - year - old Braiden McCahren .

A0: Beadle County State 's Attorney Michael Moore
RelatedSentence: Moore is scheduled to update the commissioners Monday .
McCahren has pleaded not guilty to first - degree murder in the December 2012 shooting death of 16 - year - old Dalton Williams .
The Sully County Sheriff 's Office says a prominent figure in the South Dakota golfing community has died in an all - terrain vehicle accident .
